Posts.Content: Have you tried talking to your doctor about treatments for hotflashes? Effexor (In low dose) seems to have some good results. As to lack of energy and mental fog and memory issues some kind of stimulent meds?
Posts.Title: Hormone Therapy is my KRYPTONITE
